name: realities-app
description: An app for tribal decentralised organisations.

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm start --prefix api" "./scripts/wait.sh && npm start --prefix ui"
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix api && npm install --prefix ui
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix api && npm run build --prefix ui
scripts.test:run:deps: sudo concurrently --kill-others "npm run test:run:neo" "npm run test:run:mongo"
